pr_title: [HBASE-24176]user_permission '.*' command failed to show all table permissions

timeline.message:
user_permission failed when show table permissions with '.*' argument

[HBASE-22879]user_permission command failed to show global permission

timeline.bodyText: found_permission should be set to false before test user_permission '.*'
timeline.author: guangxuCheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -91,6 +91,14 @@ def teardown
       end
       assert(found_permission, 'Permission for user ' + global_user_name + ' was not found.')
 
+      security_admin.user_permission('.*') do |user, permission|
